snippet: Iraq's Kurdistan is facing growing tensions between its government and the key opposition faction, which briefly disrupted oil flows from the semi-autonomous region this week and has threatened to take more action in coming days....

headline.main: Kirkuk Oil Flows in Jeopardy Again as Kurdish Tensions Grow
headline.print_headline: Kirkuk Oil Flows in Jeopardy Again as Kurdish Tensions Grow

lead_paragraph: Iraq's Kurdistan is facing growing tensions between its government and the key opposition faction, which briefly disrupted oil flows from the semi-autonomous region this week and has threatened to take more action in coming days.
